title: [Bug]: teams for linux deb app does not show ui
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

when teams for linux debian app is launched the teams window is not started

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.14.0

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.install teams-for-linux through debian repo
2.after installation launch teams-for-linux app
3.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1. ui should open in order to use
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'

❯ teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
all good with appLogLevels you aren't using them
all good with customUserDir you aren't using them
Initialising logger with config: "{}"
10:43:55.138 › File logging at /home/pushkar/.config/teams-for-linux/logs/main.log with level silly
10:43:55.140 › Console logging enabled with level silly
10:43:55.140 › Logger initialised
10:43:55.140 › configPath: /home/pushkar/.config/teams-for-linux
10:43:55.141 › configFile: { closeAppOnCross: true, appIcon: true, appIconType: 'default' }
10:43:55.144 › Running under Wayland, switching to PipeWire...
10:43:55.203 › (node:54423) [DEP0180] DeprecationWarning: fs.Stats constructor is deprecated.
(Use `teams-for-linux --trace-deprecation ...` to show where the warning was created)
10:43:55.360 › (node:54423) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: TypeError: this.config.appIcon.trim is not a function
    at TrayIconChooser.getFile (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/browser/tools/trayIconChooser.js:20:27)
    at BrowserWindowManager.createNewBrowserWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:55:55)
    at BrowserWindowManager.createWindow (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/browserWindowManager.js:31:28)
    at Object.onAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/mainAppWindow/index.js:48:39)
    at App.handleAppReady (/opt/teams-for-linux/resources/app.asar/app/index.js:283:17)
    at App.emit (node:events:530:35)
10:43:55.361 › (node:54423) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). To terminate the node process on unhandled promise rejection, use the CLI flag `--unhandled-rejections=strict` (see https://nodejs.org/api/cli.html#cli_unhandled_rejections_mode). (rejection id: 2)
```

### Additional context

using ubuntu 24.04
